items.q: How does the AI screening work?
items.a: Our AI analyzes resumes against your job requirements, scoring candidates on skills, experience, and cultural fit indicators.

items.q: Does it integrate with our ATS?
items.a: Yes. HireWise integrates with Greenhouse, Lever, Workday, and 30+ other platforms via API.
SOC 2 Type II certified. All data encrypted at rest and in transit. GDPR compliant.

items.q: Can we customize the AI criteria?
items.a: Absolutely. Set custom scoring weights, must-have skills, and knockout questions.
